before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"dfng9","text":"For media/reagent recipes see the last section of the protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"269mv","text":"This protocol is designed to convert human induced pluripotent stem cells (PSCs) into retinal ganglion cell induced neurons (RGC-iNs) using a doxycycline-inducible polycistronic transcription factor gene cassette containing human NEUROG2, ATOH7, ISL1, and POU4F2. The TetO-driven transgene cassette is integrated into the CLYBL safe harbor site using a CRISPR-Cas12a ribonucleoprotein. The process of generating neurons is greatly enhanced by the inclusion of the BMP blocker LDN-193189.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"ci7j6","text":"Apart from observation under the microscope, counting, and centrifugation, all steps should be carried out in a sterile biological safety cabinet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"akqqi","text":"Grow PSCs in mTeSR1 under hypoxia (  O2/  CO2) or normoxia (  O2/  CO2) at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":38,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":44,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":63,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":69,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":60,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":65,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dk86j","text":"12-well plate (3.5 cm2): Plate 5,000 PSCs into each well of 12-well plates in mTeSR1 in the presence of   blebbistatin (blebb; 2,000x stock).
